## Bicycle Master Plan

The City of Monrovia adopted a Bicycle Master Plan in 2018 that outlines improvements to make Monrovia more bicycle-friendly. The plan includes:

- Expanding the network of bike lanes and paths
- Adding bicycle parking throughout the city
- Creating safer crossings at major intersections
- Implementing education and encouragement programs

[Download the Monrovia Bicycle Master Plan (PDF)](https://www.monroviaca.gov/home/showdocument?id=19453)
